name: Dragon Warrior - Dragon Warrior Slayer Games
name_original: Dragon Warrior - Dragon Warrior Slayer Games
description:
Dragon Warrior is an exciting ARPG with stunning 3D game graphics and RTS gameplay.

Dragon Warrior is a visually spectacular, Sword Combat game.

The once prosperous and peaceful Kingdom is under siege from Demons.

Kill All Skeletons, Demons, and Trolls who dare stand in your path!

Restore peace and prosperity, Glory shall be yours!
